Reviews.Title: easy setup, not long lasting
Reviews.Author: Donavan Sell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit, and its my first Security camera install.the setup and install was easy and straight forward.after a few weeks the unit stopped recording and was beeping,called Tech support they were helpful running me though the unit.Then they asked me to take apart the unit to access the reset button inside the unit.kind of annoying to put the reset button inside, but whatever.Anyway unit was Ng so I sent it in, they sent another,  That was Ng,  they sent another and was fine for a week then same thing started beeping and stopped recording.I think I will keep the cameras, as they are good hd ones, and mounted in my house, But Im going to toss the DVR and find another.
